title: Secure Authentication and Multi-Factor Login
summary: Implement secure user authentication using multi-factor verification for safe access to the banking portal.
description: Develop a secure authentication system that includes user registration, login, and password management with multi-factor authentication options such as OTP, SMS, or biometric verification. This ensures data security while enabling a smooth user experience.

userStories.title: User Registration and Login
userStories.description: As a customer, I want to register and log into the portal securely so that I can access online banking services.

userStories.title: Multi-Factor Authentication Setup
userStories.description: As a customer, I want to authenticate using an additional factor such as OTP or biometric verification so that my login is secure against unauthorized access.

userStories.title: Password Reset Functionality
userStories.description: As a customer, I want to securely reset my password using automated verification so that I can regain account access when necessary.

title: Responsive and User-Friendly Interface
summary: Develop a responsive user interface for seamless experience across all devices.
description: Design a modern, responsive web interface that adjusts automatically to various screen sizes. Ensure consistent design elements and intuitive navigation for improved customer engagement.

userStories.title: Responsive Layouts
userStories.description: As a customer, I want the web portal to adapt to my device so that I can use it comfortably on desktop, tablet, or mobile.

userStories.title: Intuitive Navigation
userStories.description: As a customer, I want clear and easy-to-use navigation so that I can quickly find the services I need.

title: Personalized Dashboard Experience
summary: Build a dynamic dashboard customized to user profiles, showing relevant services and product recommendations.
description: Develop a central dashboard view that delivers personalized financial insights, accounts, and product offerings based on the userâ€™s eligibility and role. The design should make essential data accessible at a glance.

userStories.title: Display Personalized Account Information
userStories.description: As a customer, I want to see my account details and balance on the dashboard so that I can quickly review my financial status.

userStories.title: Show Relevant Product Recommendations
userStories.description: As a customer, I want to see products and services relevant to my profile so that I can explore new opportunities easily.

title: Account Opening and Service Request Workflows
summary: Enable customers to open new accounts and manage service modifications efficiently.
description: Implement end-to-end digital workflows for submitting new account applications and service modification requests. Provide intuitive step-by-step forms, minimizing the number of clicks and supporting partial completion.

userStories.title: Submit Account Opening Requests
userStories.description: As a customer, I want to open a new bank account online so that I can access banking services without visiting a branch.

userStories.title: Request Service Modifications
userStories.description: As a customer, I want to modify my existing banking services so that I can update my preferences online.

userStories.title: Save and Resume Incomplete Applications
userStories.description: As a customer, I want to save partially completed applications so that I can finish them later.

title: Real-Time Request Status and Notifications
summary: Provide users with real-time updates and email alerts regarding their submitted requests.
description: Deploy a notification system that tracks the status of submitted requests in real time. Send automated updates and emails to keep users informed about progress, approvals, or required actions.

userStories.title: Track Request Status in Real Time
userStories.description: As a customer, I want to view the live status of my application so that I know where my request stands.

userStories.title: Receive Email Notifications
userStories.description: As a customer, I want to get email notifications about updates on my requests so that I stay informed without checking the portal frequently.

title: Document Upload and Management
summary: Enable secure document handling for account and service applications.
description: Allow users to upload, store, and manage required documents directly within the portal with proper encryption and validation to ensure data integrity.

userStories.title: Upload Required Documents
userStories.description: As a customer, I want to upload digital copies of my documents so that I can complete account applications online.

userStories.title: Verify Uploaded Files
userStories.description: As a system, I want to validate uploaded files for correctness and security so that only valid documents are processed.

title: Role-Based Access Control
summary: Implement role-based permissions for customers and administrators.
description: Create and enforce a permission management system where users can only access resources defined by their roles, ensuring data protection and administrative control.

userStories.title: Define Customer and Admin Roles
userStories.description: As an admin, I want to define roles and access levels so that users have access only to the services they are authorized for.

userStories.title: Restrict Access Based on Role
userStories.description: As a system, I want to restrict access based on user roles so that sensitive operations remain protected.

title: Core Banking System Integration
summary: Integrate self-service portal with the existing core banking system.
description: Build APIs and middleware to synchronize user data, accounts, and service requests between the new portal and the existing core banking infrastructure, maintaining high performance and reliability.

userStories.title: Synchronize Data with Core Banking System
userStories.description: As a system, I want to sync customer data with the core banking platform so that the information stays consistent across all systems.

userStories.title: Handle Integration Errors Gracefully
userStories.description: As a system, I want to log and handle integration errors properly so that operations continue smoothly.

title: Data Security and Interaction History
summary: Ensure secure data storage and maintain a complete interaction log.
description: Implement encryption for sensitive data and maintain comprehensive logs of all user interactions. Enable auditing for compliance, transparency, and accountability.

userStories.title: Secure Data Storage with Encryption
userStories.description: As a system, I want to encrypt all sensitive data so that it remains protected from unauthorized access.

userStories.title: Maintain Audit Trail
userStories.description: As a customer, I want to view my past interactions and transactions so that I can track my banking history.
